definition: get out of here!/beat it!
to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!
egg/CL:個|个[ge4],打[da2]/oval-shaped thing
variant of 蜑[Dan4]

sentences.english: Drop your crybaby stuff and drive that deal through with Pak.
sentences.chinese: 讓那些無能的人滾蛋吧，好好面對與巴基斯坦的問題。

sentences.english: I am glad to see Flavio busted, I make no bones about that.
sentences.chinese: 我很高興看到弗拉維奧滾蛋，雖然我一分錢拿不到。

sentences.english: Harry used the threat of magic spells to get rid of the sniffy Dudley Dursley.
sentences.chinese: 哈利假裝要使用魔咒，叫不識趣的達力滾蛋。

sentences.english: A few Saturdays ago, he came with snacks and a plastic bag stuffed with hard-boiled eggs.
sentences.chinese: 數星期前，他帶了一些零食和一袋石滾蛋。

definition: firm/decisive
see 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
(final particle equivalent to 了[le5])/(particle calling attention to, or mildly warning of, a situation)
subordinates in gang of bandits
ma/mom/mother
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
to stomp or hop about (in anxiety, anger etc)/to dance on one's feet/hopping mad (anxious, etc)
to play/to have fun/to hang out
rampant/unbridled/arrogant/aggressive
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
to leave/to walk away/to beat it/to move aside
(coll.) to beat it/to take French leave
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
to do sth more quickly/Hurry up!/Get a move on!
nonsense/rubbish/superfluous words/You don't say!/No kidding! (gently sarcastic)
